3. Assess all 4 features of fetal heart rate: baseline rate; baseline variability; presence or absence of decelerations
(and concerning characteristics of variable decelerations if present); presence of accelerations.
4. Use these four features to then categorise the trace
5. Then make a management plan based on the category.
